entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump Cool story.

Now do the current recession, 40 million Americans filing for unemployment, 16+% unemployment rate, GDP falling by nearly 6%, racial tensions, new spikes in Covid19 across the country and 113,380 Americans who have died from Coronavirus.
